short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Discover new recipes and manage existing ones, all in one place.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Nomscovery - The Recipe Book App

Tired of trying to remember which site you saw that nomable 
recipe on? Recipe hunting no longer needs to be difficult.

With Nomscovery we've built you a Recipe Book App to watch, manage 
AND jump directly to you're favourite recipe, all within a single window!

Best of all, no sign up required!

More features coming soon.

Dec 2021 Updates
-------------------------------------------------------------- 
- Share recipes to your phone.
- Filter recipes using the search bar.

Nov 2021 Updates
--------------------------------------------------------------
- Jump to the recipe in a single click
